title: Introduction to Land-based Rainwater Harvesting - RUVIVAL Toolbox

tasks.task: Understanding and implementing micro-catchment rainwater harvesting methods
subtasks: Recognizing the consequences of water scarcity
Identifying regions affected by water scarcity
Understanding the importance of land-based rainwater harvesting
Distinguishing between micro-catchment and macro-catchment harvesting
Learning the purpose of micro-catchment rainwater harvesting
Understanding various methods of micro-catchment implementation (e.g., strip-catchment tillage, contour barriers, swales)
Recognizing the function of cross-slope systems
Recognizing the importance of constructed barriers in water collection
Understanding macro-catchment rainwater harvesting categories (hillside, stream bed, ephemeral stream diversion)
Identifying the benefits of land-based rainwater harvesting (reducing soil erosion, increasing groundwater recharge)
Acknowledging the role of rainwater harvesting in agricultural resilience

tasks.task: Understanding the components of macro-catchment rainwater harvesting systems
subtasks: Understanding the difference between micro-catchment and macro-catchment approaches
Recognizing the concept of a catchment area outside the application area in macro-catchment systems
Understanding the purpose of collecting water in macro-catchment systems (groundwater recharge, storage in open or closed systems)
Recognizing examples of common catchment areas in macro-catchment systems (e.g., hill slopes, roads, cultivated land)
Understanding the functionality of hillside systems in macro-catchment harvesting
Learning about structures like sand dams or check dams in stream bed systems
Understanding the purpose of ephemeral stream diversion systems in macro-catchment harvesting

tasks.task: Understanding benefits and applications of land-based rainwater harvesting
subtasks: Recognizing the importance of reducing soil erosion via rainwater harvesting
Understanding how rainwater harvesting can mitigate flood occurrences
Realizing the importance of water infiltration and groundwater recharge
Acknowledging the contribution of rainwater harvesting to agricultural activity and food availability in the face of climate change
Considering the role of rainwater harvesting in supporting agricultural resilience under water scarcity and mismanagement
